name: DisruptionMagazine
0:
”Alexa, launch Disruption Magazine.”
”Alexa, open Disruption Magazine and pick an article for me.”
”Alexa, ask Disruption Magazine when the next edition comes out.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: disruption magazine
des:
This skill provides the latest articles from Disruption Magazine in an audio format. It allows users to read an article by name or by topic, and it also allows users to have Alexa recommend an article as well. 

- Get a recommended article by saying 'Pick an Article for me', or 'Choose an Article for me'
- Get a list of articles by saying 'List articles'
- Be read a specific article by saying 'Read "The Last Word" to me'
- Read an article by a specific author by saying 'Read me articles by Amber Mac'
- Get an article by keyword by saying 'Tell me the Analytics story'
- Learn about the next edition by asking 'When does the next edition come out?'
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
